Additionally, the film boasts an impressive cast that includes actors like Bill Fagerbakke, Rick Aviles, Michael J. Fox, Bruce McGill, Mark Margolis, Fred Gwynne.

Finally, if you're looking for something completely different, then perhaps "You" (2014) might be more appealing to you. This film features an engaging storyline that explores themes of love, relationships, and self-discovery. Additionally, the film boasts an impressive cast that includes actors like Bill Fagerbakke, Rick Aviles, Michael J. Fox, Bruce McGill, Mark Margolis, Fred Gwynne.

I hope these recommendations help you find a movie that suits your tastes and preferences for transhumanism movies.
